teaser: $4.7 billion. $20,000. 6 seconds. 890 billion: Can you guess what these numbers mean?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 27, 2013
title: BBM and time spent online: This week's Silicon Tally
contentencoded:
$4.7 billion. $20,000. 6 seconds. 890 billion: Can you guess what these numbers mean?

We put Amy O'Leary, technology reporter for the New York Times, to the test for our latest edition of Silicon Tally. 

And check out Amy's piece about the new genre of 'lyric videos' here.  

Click on the audio player above to play along.
